title: Buff Ekko Jungle again?
body: Cause why not? They nerfed electrocute and then nerfed dark harvest. Meh. Maybe give him like a 2 armor buff.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Monstermushmush,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kn4kEL7g,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-10T23:45:02.448+0000)
>
> Cause why not? They nerfed electrocute and then nerfed dark harvest. Meh. Maybe give him like a 2 armor buff.

Lets not buff Ekko. If people start playing him I am going to be mad. (Ekko mid OTP here)

The idea I have had for a long time is to make his passive a 3 second CD on monsters and remain a 5 second CD on champs. It would help his clear considering he can hardly do 3 camps without having to back.
